verses.text: <a href="../1-Corinthians-16-1/" title="1 Corinthians 16:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"Now concerning the collection for the saints, as I have given order to the churches of Galatia, even so do ye.
2 "JESUS_END"Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store, as God hath prospered him, that there be no gatherings when I come.
3 "JESUS_END"And when I come, whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters, them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-4/" title="1 Corinthians 16:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4  "JESUS_END"And if it be meet that I go also, they shall go with me.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-5/" title="1 Corinthians 16:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"Now I will come unto you, when I shall pass through Macedonia: for I do pass through Macedonia.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-6/" title="1 Corinthians 16:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"And it may be that I will abide, yea, and winter with you, that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-7/" title="1 Corinthians 16:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"For I will not see you now by the way; but I trust to tarry a while with you, if the Lord permit.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-8/" title="1 Corinthians 16:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8  "JESUS_END"But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.
9 "JESUS_END"For a great door and effectual is opened unto me, and there are many adversaries.
10 "JESUS_END"Now if Timotheus come, see that he may be with you without fear: for he worketh the work of the Lord, as I also do.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-11/" title="1 Corinthians 16:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"Let no man therefore despise him: but conduct him forth in peace, that he may come unto me: for I look for him with the brethren.

12 "JESUS_END"As touching our brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren: but his will was not at all to come at this time; but he will come when he shall have convenient time.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-13/" title="1 Corinthians 16:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13  "JESUS_END"Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-14/" title="1 Corinthians 16:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14  "JESUS_END"Let all your things be done with charity.
15 "JESUS_END"I beseech you, brethren, (ye know the house of Stephanas, that it is the firstfruits of Achaia, and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints,)
16 "JESUS_END"That ye submit yourselves unto such, and to every one that helpeth with us, and laboureth.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-17/" title="1 Corinthians 16:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17  "JESUS_END"I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus: for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-18/" title="1 Corinthians 16:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18  "JESUS_END"For they have refreshed my spirit and yours: therefore acknowledge ye them that are such.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-19/" title="1 Corinthians 16:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19  "JESUS_END"The churches of Asia salute you. Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord, with the church that is in their house.
<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-20/" title="1 Corinthians 16:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20  "JESUS_END"All the brethren greet you. Greet ye one another with an holy kiss.
21 "JESUS_END"The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand.

<a href="../1-Corinthians-16-22/" title="1 Corinthians 16:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22  "JESUS_END"If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be Anathema Maranatha.
23 "JESUS_END"The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
24 "JESUS_END"My love be with you all in Christ Jesus. Amen. (The first epistle to the Corinthians was written from Philippi by Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus and Timotheus.)
